title: Interpretation of a dream about losing sight in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dreaming of losing sight in a dream and seeing loss of sight in a dream indicates defects in religion and many sins and may refer to forbidden money. Interpretation of dreams to see blindness in a dream of a woman in a dream, a married woman, a married man, a pregnant woman and a young man. Since it is No one can see without eyes, so a person must always glorify his Lord and initiate this blessing and pray to Almighty God to perpetuate this blessing. There is also what is called sudden blindness or temporary blindness, but what is the interpretation of a dream about losing vision in a dream, as we know that The dream differs from one person to another, so we deal with the interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream of seeing blindness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of ignoring Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of losing sight in a dream indicates neglect of religion. Interpretation of a dream of losing sight in a dream indicates that the student will receive On illegal money in his life. Interpretation of dreams for losing sight in a poor man’s dream. Seeing it symbolizes that he will acquire great wealth and become wealthy. Likewise, losing sight in a dream due to a specific person indicates that this person will be a reason for misguidance. Seeing blindness in a dream from a relative of the dreamer, such as a brother, wife, or father, is evidence of shortcomings that He suffers from it in his relationship with himself and others. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blindness in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about skipping a woman’s bowlInterpretation of a dream about losing a woman in general is an indication of good news that she will hear soon. If a woman sees in her dream that she is blind, her vision indicates that good news awaits her , perhaps an engagement or a prestigious job. The interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream is evidence that the people around her are deceiving her and she needs to know their true nature. The interpretation of a dream about losing sight and regaining it in a dream indicates that she will get rid of her fears and sorrows in her life, as well as cancel her relationship with an evil person. Vision A blind woman in a dream about a pot and staying away from it means that she has actually moved away from the unclear things in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing what is around the eye in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s neglect. A dream about losing sight in a married woman’s dream indicates bad behavior, so in waking life She must reconsider her behavior towards her husband. Failure to look in a married woman’s dream indicates many things, including instability in her life, and a lack of worship and obedience. The interpretation of blindness in a dream indicates that she is deceived by the words of others, which causes marital problems. Interpretation of a dream about her husband’s blindness In a dream for a married woman, who sees herself helping him with this injury, it indicates overcoming adversities and obstacles. See also: Interpretation of the letter A in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s neglect. Interpretation of a dream about blindness in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will face difficulties in some matters, whether Financially or health wise. As for loss of sight and the return of a pregnant woman, the evidence for this is alleviating sorrows and fears and getting rid of distress. Seeing a blind doctor in a dream is a matter.

title: Interpretation of a dream: I was killed by a bullet, but I did not die in the dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I was killed by a bullet and did not die in a dream. In the following lines, we provide an explanation of all the meanings mentioned by interpretation scholars in this vision in detail, the interpretation of the dream that I was killed by a bullet. A bullet and he did not die in a dream... Interpretation of a dream: He killed me with a bullet, but I did not die in a dream. Interpretation of a dream: He killed me with a bullet, and why did I die in a dream? We did not find any specific interpretations of his vision. However, seeing murder with a weapon in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God is All-Knowing. When a young man sees a murder with a gun, this may lead to the goodness that he will be blessed with, God willing. If a married woman sees murder with a gun, it may portend a great expense, God willing. Interpretation Dreaming of escaping from a gunshot in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from gunfire in a dream. If the dreamer sees someone trying to kill him in a dream, this may be an indication of psychological crises and pressures, and God knows best. While freedom from evil may seem good, God also knows the unseen. It shows getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about killing and escaping in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about killing and escaping in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, running away in a dream could be a sign of repentance, and God has all knowledge of the unseen. If the dreamer sees him running in a dream, it may be a sign of his repentance for his sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. When you see the oppressed person leaving, it may represent Victory, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about killing and escaping from the police in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about killing and escaping from the police in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing that escaping from the police in a dream could be a good sign for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is escaping from the police, it may be a sign of sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself escaping From the police, this may indicate returning from the wrong path, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about fear of death in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about fear of death in a dream could be a sign of fear of your inability to achieve goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees his fear of being killed, it may lead to striving. To change some things, and God knows best. When you see the fear of killing, it can be a sign of trust, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams: I killed someone I did not know by shooting them in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that you killed someone I did not know with bullets in a dream, it can lead to goodness, as it may indicate achieving goals. Also, to see someone I don’t know shot can mean that problems will go away and God is higher and knows better. If a married woman sees that someone she doesn’t know has been shot in a dream, it could be a sign that desires will come true and God knows the unseen. Interpretation Dreams: I killed someone I did not know in self-defense in a dreamInterpretation of dreams: You killed someone I did not know in self-defense in a dream, this may be a sign that you are not silent about the truth and God knows what is hidden

title: Interpretation of entering a stranger’s house in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of entering a stranger’s house in a dream for a single woman. It is one of the dreams that many people associate with a strange character. It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer worry about its interpretations, meanings and explanations, especially since some dreams have positive and uplifting meanings and others have the same meaning and are not good. Through the following lines, we will explain to you during these lines that you entered a strange house in a dream, based on what many dream interpretation scholars have interpreted. Interpretation of entering a strange house in a dream for a single woman. There are various signs of an unmarried girl entering a house other than her family’s house in a dream, especially Strange home, most of them, God willing, are favorable to her. Among the most important interpretations are the following: If a girl feels safe in her home and she dreams of the house of a strange man she does not know, then this portends the imminent date of her marriage to a respectable man. She also has a good personality and good qualities and will be stable in her life with him. If the young woman is alone and sees herself visiting a house If she is newly suffering from fear and anxiety, the vision indicates her death. If she is in good health, this indicates the removal of all worries and obstacles from her life, and God knows best. However, if she dreams of a new and unfamiliar dwelling, this may be a sign of upcoming luck and blessings. The strange palace in which the girl lives is evidence of her longevity. If she enters her lover’s house in her dream, this represents the girl’s mistakes that she must avoid at all costs and acknowledge God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about entering a strange house for a married woman. Entering a strange residence is always considered and the interpretation depends mainly on The dreamer's social status and dream details. The interpretation of a married woman includes the following: If the vision occurred in a different but completely new house, and the house was full of happiness and security, then it is a symbol of the abundance of sustenance and blessing that will come to her and the residents of her house. If she dreams that she is trapped in a strange and unfamiliar house where the door is locked from the inside and she cannot Escaping, this indicates a difficult situation in life and problems. If she notices water splashing in her house in a dream, this portends harm to her, whether at home or in her marriage. Interpretation of a dream about entering the house of people I do not know about his man. Here we will look at some of these interpretations for a man to see a dream about entering a house Unfamiliar. Interpretations include the following: For a man, seeing an unfamiliar house is a sign of anxiety and stress during the period in which the man sees this vision. Also, entering an unknown house for a man in a dream indicates his illness in reality, and God knows best. If a man sees in a dream a strange house If the house is large and has many beautiful rooms, this indicates an abundance of food. If the house is narrow and small, this indicates a lack of livelihood. If he sees a house alone, this is a sign that he is behaving badly and that others will not respect your decisions. According to another interpretation According to Ibn Sirin, seeing the unknown house is a sign of the home of the afterlife, God willing, good news and glad tidings. Interpretation of dreams to enter the house of people I do not know about a divorced woman. The dream of entering a house is considered

title: Interpretation of seeing treasure in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Roy2a.com. Since seeing a treasure in a dream is a sign of great success and great superiority for the fortuneteller, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing it in the dream of an unmarried girl, And a married woman, and a pregnant woman, and a man and a man. Young man. What is the interpretation of seeing treasure in a dream for a single girl: A single girl seeing treasure in a dream is an indication of obtaining the highest academic degrees from the largest universities in the world. A single woman seeing buried treasure in a dream is an indication of her imminent marriage or obtaining a large inheritance from her relatives. Seeing treasure in The dream indicates that the visitor is approaching the Sacred House of God and performing Hajj or Umrah rituals. Seeing a large treasure in a dream for a single woman indicates her husband’s high morals and an attempt to make her happy and satisfied with him, or to a great job in the state. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gold dinar in a dream. What is the woman’s interpretation? A married woman who sees a treasure in a dream: A married woman who sees a treasure in a dream It indicates that he will have a beautiful and just son, and he will be fair to her and his family. A married woman who sees a buried treasure in a dream It indicates the opening of the doors of great livelihood for her and her husband. A married woman seeing a treasure buried under Earth: Dreaming about it is a sign that she will soon hear the news of her pregnancy or her recovery from a cursed disease. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a treasure in a dream: A man sees a treasure buried underground in a dream, indicating a long journey of struggle and years of misery to secure the future and increase his livelihood. A man sees a treasure in a dream. The dream indicates its great status among people and its wide knowledge and use by the world. A man seeing antiquities and treasure in a dream indicates his great reputation among people. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gold or silver necklace in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees treasure in a dream: A young man seeing treasure in An underground dream is a sign of returning to his homeland and securing his future. Seeing a young man pulling treasure from the ground is an indication of his connection to a girl with a high moral character and character and people’s love for her. A young man seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream is an indication of the strength of his intelligence, his strong personality among the people, and his great success in his studies and work. See also: Interpretation Seeing a gold ring or diamond lobes in a dream: What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees treasure in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman finding treasure in a dream is an indication of facilitating her birth and getting rid of all the pain of pregnancy and childbirth while providing goodness for her. Seeing in a dream the owner of the treasure is a sign that he has a good son who will have a future. Bright. Seeing a pregnant woman finding silver treasure in a dream indicates that she will be blessed with a beautiful and fair girl. What is the interpretation of seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream: A single girl seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream is a sign of the presence of many bad friends and enemies of success in her life. Seeing a married woman seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream is an indication of It brings its kindness and abundant livelihood. Seeing the end to find traces of a dream is one of the bad visions that indicate

title: Interpretation of seeing my son sick in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Therefore, when I see my son sick in a dream, the vision makes the dreamer feel worried about his son, so he searches for the meaning of the interpretation of the vision, is it worthy of praise or not, and in our topic today we will deal with the interpretation of I see my son sick in a dream about a divorced woman from your site gptafser.com/ So follow us. Interpretation of seeing my son sick in a dream about a single girl: Seeing the unmarried girl whom she loves and loves is sick and unable to move in her sleep. Seeing an unmarried girl indicates that the young man will soon face crises and problems in his life. But with the grace of Almighty God, he will overcome them and be able to solve them. Seeing a girl dreaming that one of her family members is suffering from an illness. The vision is an indication that the relative of the unmarried girl who dreamed that he was ill-intentioned is in reality exposed to a financial crisis. It may be psychological in his life in the next stage. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is sick makes her unable to MovementThe vision shows that the girl will be exposed in her next life to a period of extreme anguish and fatigue. Therefore, the vision warns her not to quickly return to God and seek forgiveness. See also: Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream in good health. Interpretation of seeing my son sick in a dream for a married woman. Seeing illness in general in a married woman’s dream. It appears The vision is that a married woman enjoys a stable marital and family life and lives in peace and security. Seeing a sick married woman in a dream. Seeing her means that someone close to her will be affected by something bad or something unpleasant. Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is suffering from a serious illness. Her vision shows the extent to which The visionary’s love for her husband. A married woman falling ill in her dream with a serious illness. Her vision shows that she will have a lot of money, which she will collect after putting in a lot of effort in her life. A married woman’s vision in her dream about illness also indicates that she is one of those women who are afraid On her family. It consists of her husband and children from every evil that befalls them in their lives. A married woman seeing in her dream that her son is sick. And she is trying hard to get medicine for her son, and she has actually succeeded. The vision indicates that the married woman will contract a disease in her next life. Interpretation of seeing my son Sick in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who saw in a dream that someone he knew was suffering from a disease that led to him being hospitalized, was actually suffering from a disease in his real life. Note that he gave good news to the patient that God Almighty would heal him from this disease. The vision may be an indication of his recovery and that God It will relieve him of all his worries and anxieties. A man seeing in a dream that one of his close friends is suffering from an illness and died because of it. Here, dream interpretation scholars interpreted the vision as good news for the dreamer’s friend that God will relieve him of his distress. And soon resolve the crises and difficulties that this man is suffering from. Seeing a man In a dream, one of his friends is sick. The vision indicates some crises and problems in his friend’s life. But if this friend has a job and a job, the vision indicates the presence of problems and crises that he faces in his work. If a man sees that his girlfriend or wife is sick in a dream, the vision indicates That the dreamer will be separated

A man who saw in a dream that someone he knew was suffering from a disease that led to him being hospitalized, was actually suffering from a disease in his real life. Note that he gave good news to the patient that God Almighty would heal him from this disease. The vision may be an indication of his recovery and that God It will relieve him of all his worries and anxieties. A man seeing in a dream that one of his close friends is suffering from an illness and died because of it. Here, dream interpretation scholars interpreted the vision as good news for the dreamer’s friend that God will relieve him of his distress. And soon resolve the crises and difficulties that this man is suffering from. Seeing a man In a dream, one of his friends is sick. The vision indicates some crises and problems in his friend’s life. But if this friend has a job and a job, the vision indicates the presence of problems and crises that he faces in his work. If a man sees that his girlfriend or wife is sick in a dream, the vision indicates That the dreamer will be separated

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of my sister’s child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of my sister’s child in a dream. In the following lines, we will provide an interpretation of the dream about the death of my sister’s child in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my sister’s child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my sister’s child in a dream. Seeing the death of a child can indicate that there is a problem and that God is higher and more knowledgeable. If the dreamer sees the death of a child, this may be evidence of the problems he is going through, and God knows best. Also, seeing the death of a child can mean failure and loss, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. When the dreamer sees the death of a child in... In a dream, this may be evidence that he has committed sins and misdeeds, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a bride in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a bride in a dream can express things that are not good, and God Almighty is upon you. The dreamer seeing the death of a bride on her wedding day may lead to disappointment, and God knows the unseen. It can also be It indicates disappointment or illness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the death of a bride in a dream, this may be evidence of judgments, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about an angel of death wearing black clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an angel of death wearing black clothes in a dream could be a sign of instability, and God knows the unseen. When you see the angel of death in black clothes in a dream, this may be evidence of sins and he must repent, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees the angel of death in black clothes taking his soul, this may lead to anxiety and sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the angel of death speaking to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an angel Death speaking to me in a dream could be an indication of a long life, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman sees the angel of death speaking to her, this may lead to happiness, and God knows the unseen. When you see the angel of death speaking to you in a dream, it may be evidence of Salah al-Din, and God knows best. Likewise, if the girl sees the angel that the angel of death is speaking to her, this can be interpreted as saying that it is upon her, praise be to God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of an angel of death wearing white clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of an angel of death wearing white clothes in a dream can be a signal. To be satisfied with God, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the angel of death in white clothes can also express the best of the situation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see the angel of death in white clothes in a dream, this can be evidence of your performing religious duties, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the angel of death in white clothes White can also express goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from the Angel of Death in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from the Angel of Death in a dream could be a sign of guilt and God knows the unseen. As his guilt due to his bad actions may suggest, God is also Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing escape may indicate From the Angel of Death also indicates the need to repent, and God knows best. When a married man sees himself fleeing from the Angel of Death, this may be a sign that he has been warned to repent before it is too late, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dead person asking for water in a dream: Seeing a dead person thirsty in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person being thirsty and asking for waterA dream of a dead man asking for waterGiving water to a dead person in a dreamSeeing the dead saying that I am thirstyInterpretation of a dream about someone asking me for waterThirst of the dead in a dreamInterpretation of asking for water in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a dead person carrying waterSeeing the dead in a dream is a real and honest dream and often carries within it meanings and indications intended to be conveyed. To the seer, based on what the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, narrated in more detail. From one place of his opinion. Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for water or thirst in a dream. In their interpretation of seeing a dead person thirsty and asking for water in a dream, the interpreters said that this situation often indicates the deceased’s need for some of the things requested by the fortuneteller, which the fortuneteller must take seriously. Grandpa and come to them. Most interpreters, including Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, said: If the dead person is in a state of thirst or asks for water in a dream, then seeing him in this state means that the dead person needs some work that will satisfy the purpose. It benefits him from his Lord, such as praying for him and paying zakat on his behalf, as well as performing various acts of worship on his behalf, such as Hajj or Umrah and others. Seeing a dead person asking for water in a dream may indicate that the debt is spent on him when he is awake and gets rid of it, as debt is one of the things that burdens the dead person after his death. It is said in some places that seeing a dead person thirsty or asking for water in a dream could mean a reminder to their children, parents, and loved ones. By not neglecting their dead and forgetting them in real life and constantly reminding them to pray and ask forgiveness for them and do everything possible for their benefit to the pioneer by taking a lesson and preaching and preparing for death that surprises a person at any time by doing good and returning justice to his people and paying the accumulated debts. There are some problems and disorders that the dreamer suffers from when awake, and they are inherited from worry, anxiety, anguish, and sadness. Seeing a dead person asking for water by Waseem Youssef - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream, as this vision is considered one of the desired visions that is considered good with its different meanings and connotations based on what a person sees in his dream in terms of scenes and details. The interpreters have explained the meanings of these dreams, as the dreamer’s vision of eating beans, cooking them, or buying them differs among themselves in their interpretations. Among the translators who tried to clarify it was the scholar Ibn Sirin, and from them you learn more about the interpretation of the lines. Seeing beans in a dream. Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream. Seeing that they are dry and not ripe is an indication of the arrival of food and a lot of money for the dreamer, and that the money that the dreamer obtains will increase later, and it includes other good interpretations. Here we review for you the interpretation of seeing beans in a dream. Also: Seeing beans in a dream is a sign of a new job and a door to earning a livelihood from which a lot of money will come. In addition, the financial condition of the viewer will be more stable, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. However, the researcher Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing a small amount of beans in a dream is not... He complains of sorrows or sorrows, but difficulties may arise under circumstances for some time, and then these sorrows and worries will end. But if one sees in a dream a large number of beans. It announces injustice, disappointment, and many problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a vision Olive branches in a dream for single women and married women in detail. Seeing beans in a dream for a single woman. It is worth noting that this vision in a single girl’s dream has many different interpretations, which carry many signs of insight, which vary depending on the details and scenes seen in the dream. In this paragraph, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing beans in a dream. For a single woman, it is also: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is distributing beans to people and she also sees them eating from them. It is a sign of the abundance of livelihood that comes to her, from the alms that she gives to the poor and needy. Likewise, if an unmarried woman takes a bag full of dry beans from her fiancé It is a sign of a happy marriage in the near future. But if a girl gets green beans in a dream, from her fiancé or from a young man she knows in the dream, but there is no relationship between them. It is evidence of conflict, or the big problem that exists between the girl and this person. Some said Interpreters: If she is unmarried, she cooks beans in the dream, and this indicates that marriage will be delayed for many years, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of the dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Beans in a dream for a divorced woman, as this vision in a divorced woman’s dream includes many interpretations. Interpretations that are often promising and differ from other visions based on the social status of the person being seen, and in this paragraph we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman. Woman. Beans in a dream for a divorced woman. It is also: If a divorced woman sees that she is buying beans and is happy with her purchase. This dream is evidence that he will hear good and happy news. How much

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing blood in reality or in a dream is one of the visions that raises great anxiety for a person, because the meaning of seeing blood is violence, force, and harm, and it may mean screaming and extreme anger inside the person, so when you see blood in a dream, people feel very anxious and search for the meaning of the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream. , which we will discuss in detail in this article. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing blood in a dream means that the dreamer earns a lot of money in a forbidden way or that the dreamer commits many sins and transgressions. If you see some blood spots on your clothes, then this vision It indicates a serious deception that the dreamer will face those around him. To see yourself drinking the blood of someone you know in reality and with whom you have a good relationship, this indicates helping him achieve many things in life, but if you do not know them in reality, then this vision means that you are causing some things that cause Sadness and misfortunes. Others: Seeing bloody spit from the mouth is an undesirable vision with all its interpretations because it portends something bad for the pioneer and may indicate the loss of all his money or the commission of a crime of imprisonment or illicit money. As for blood coming out of the body without a wound, it means losing a portion of money according to the amount of blood that the dreamer saw. Seeing a river of blood somewhere means that the fortuneteller will have an accident and suffer from bleeding in the place he saw it, and falling into a blood vessel means falling into immorality and committing sins. Seeing menstrual blood for a girl means marriage soon, while seeing menstrual blood for a woman means illness and extreme fatigue. If you see in your dream that the blood is hot and smells bad, this means that you will commit many sins and great sins. As for seeing a lot of blood flowing everywhere, it means that you will lose money or lose someone close to the dreamer. Swimming in the river of blood means getting... A lot of forbidden money and the fortune teller's inability to get rid of this money. As for the hands alone, the stained blood indicates illicit money, but the dreamer got rid of it and benefited from it. Blood coming out of the arteries means that the fortuneteller is very bad, or that the fortuneteller feels very sad because of the loss of someone close to him. Interpretation of a dream about donating blood by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of your vision of donating blood is interpreted Always feelings of poverty and loss of your efforts in life, especially when you feel that you have no purpose in life and strive to achieve that. And when you see yourself donating blood to someone you know, this indicates the intensity of your love for this person and that you can donate and sacrifice your life for him. And when you see in your dream that you are injured and in need To the one who supplies you with blood, it means that in reality you are going through a financial crisis. Donating blood also means that you have lost your job or something important to you and it is time to start a happy life again. Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman with blood flowing in front of her means that she will start a new life And for her sadness and deception to end. Seeing someone in front of her bleeding means that she will face or encounter an accident or sad things in her life, but she will pass this period and everything will be fine. If a woman sees that her hand hurts

And when you see yourself donating blood to someone you know, this indicates the intensity of your love for this person and that you can donate and sacrifice your life for him. Donating blood also means that you have lost your job or something important to you and it is time to start a happy life again. Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman bleeding in front of her means that she will start a new life and that her sadness and deception will end. Seeing someone bleeding in front of her means that she will face or encounter an accident or sad things in her life, but she will pass this period and everything will be fine. If a woman sees Her hand is hurting

title: Interpretation of a dream about a chicken according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a chicken in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether slaughtered, cooked, bought, cooked, raw, dead, alive, grilled, eating black and white chicken according to Ibn Sirin and others. Chicken in a dream is one of the dreams that we dream of and it carries many Important signs for a person who must be completely vigilant in his life and get its correct and correct interpretation, to know the signs in a dream, and a chicken in a dream is evidence of livelihood and goodness. The next year for a person in life in the coming period, and it is also a sign of liberation from current worries In life. Many dream interpreters around the world have unanimously agreed that a chicken in a dream is evidence of a group of interpretations, as each part of the chicken is evidence of a specific meaning or special expression, but all interpretations are useful to the person in his personal life and we will learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of chickens. In its interpretation.Interpretation of a chicken in a dream: A chicken in a dream is interpreted as a beautiful, reckless and foolish woman. It was said: Is it hidden or a servant? Whoever hunts it will obtain easy legal money, and whoever eats its meat will be provided with money from the captivity of non-Arabs. And whoever sees a chicken or a peacock coming to his house, he is the owner of calamity and immorality. It was said: The chicken and its feathers are useful wealth. Whoever sees that he is slaughtering a black chicken will marry a virgin. The chicken could be a woman who raises orphans and begs for alms for them, and she is useful. Chickens are humiliated women. The lying hen is of activity and originality, the hiding hen is of low birth, and her chicks are children of prostitution. Perhaps the chicken represents the soul of the children and their entry into the patient's health and well-being. Likewise, the ears of the chicken and the hen represent evil, distress, or death. Perhaps its entry portends illness, or the death of worries and joys, and the call for prosperity and blessings. And whoever sees a lot of chickens in his house, this indicates leadership, wealth, and the departure of fear. And whoever sees that he has taken some of the chickens, captivity and servants will affect him to such a degree. Whoever chases them will win legitimate money, and whoever sees it in his house. Many chickens represent his leadership, money, and the departure of fear. It indicates in a dream a foolish, beautiful woman. Whoever sees that he is sick and chickens enter him, this indicates his recovery. Whoever sees in a dream that his chickens scream a lot, this is interpreted as conflict, anger, and anxiety. Whoever sees in his house many chickens whose number cannot be counted, his head appears. And his wealth and status. Interpretation of slaughtering a chicken in a dream. Whoever slaughters a chicken in a dream will marry a virgin maid. Whoever sees that he is slaughtering a chicken while he is single, gets married. Whoever dreams of slaughtering a chicken, then flogs a virgin maid. Whoever sees that he is eating the meat of a chicken or plucking its feathers, he will receive money and generosity from captives and servants. Interpretation Eating chicken in a dream: Anyone who dreams of eating chicken meat is interpreted as a gift. Eating grilled chicken in a dream is evidence of making money and taking advantage of a close person. Eating chicken breasts in a dream means that you will get a job or travel. Boiled chicken in a dream is evidence of a good coming. For women in the coming period
